p: travel expenses due to officials and temporary staff (including their families) entering or leaving the service or being transferred to another place of employment

p lang: on transfer to a new place of employment and on finally leaving the institution and resettling elsewhere

p: daily subsistence allowance for officials and temporary staff who furnish evidence that they must change their place of residence on taking up duty or transferring to a new place of employment
the compensation for a probationary official who is dismissed because his work is obviously inadequate
compensation for a member of the temporary staff whose contract is terminated by the institution
the difference between the contributions paid by contract staff to a Member State pension scheme and those payable to the Union scheme in the event of reclassification of a contract.
